alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Grundy; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 8:21PM CST until December 09 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Coffee County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Warren County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Grundy County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 900 PM CST. * At 820 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Manchester, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McMinnville, Manchester, Altamont, Morrison, Beersheba Springs, Viola, Hillsboro, and Summitville. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 107 and 120. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
